text: Niyogam is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by Raju Joseph and starring Kumarakam Raghunath and Chandni in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/niyogam-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Chandni Shaju as Parvathi * Kumarakam Raghunath as Kavi * Mini Nair as Devu * Priyanka as Meenakshi * Shivaji as Panikkar * Sudheesh as Damu *Valsala Menon as Saraswathiyamma *Bobby Kottarakkara as Kaimal *Meghanathan as Bhadran ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Niyogam
